name: Mr. Umbrella
description:
Help Mr. Umbrella navigate his way down the clock tower, avoiding obstacles along the way. Can you make it to the bottom?

Features:

• Simple One-Touch Gameplay
• Endless Fun
• Beautiful Simplistic Graphics
• Compete with Friends and Family with Game Center Leaderboards!

How to Play:

Tap any where on the screen to open Mr. Umbrella's umbrella and avoid the obstacles.
